languages.text: "Мы фиксируем активный вокс-обмен на зашифрованных частотах между кораблями Эксплораторов... Фиксируем открытие огня! Они стреляют друг в друга! Но значительная часть кораблей из одной эскадры, кажется, примкнула к их противникам! Это... Это бойня. У них нет шансов".

"We are picking up an active vox-exchange on encrypted frequencies between the Explorator ships... They are opening fire! They are shooting one another! But a good part of the ships from the same squadron seem to have joined their opponents! This... This is a slaughter. They have no chance."
languages.original_text: "Мы фиксируем активный вокс-обмен на зашифрованных частотах между кораблями Эксплораторов... Фиксируем открытие огня! Они стреляют друг в друга! Но значительная часть кораблей из одной эскадры, кажется, примкнула к их противникам! Это... Это бойня. У них нет шансов".

traits.locale_text: "We are picking up an active vox-exchange on encrypted frequencies between the Explorator ships... They are opening fire! They are shooting one another! But a good part of the ships from the same squadron seem to have joined their opponents! This... This is a slaughter. They have no chance."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

But a good part of the ships from the same squadron seem to have joined their opponents! This... This is a slaughter. They have no chance."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “飞船探测到开拓者舰队的加密频率上出现了活跃的音阵信息交换……他们开火了！他们在互相射击！但其中一支队伍的绝大部分舰船似乎已经叛变到了对方的阵营！这……这简直是一场屠杀，那些人必死无疑。”
languages.original_text: "We are picking up an active vox-exchange on encrypted frequencies between the Explorator ships... They are opening fire! They are shooting one another! But a good part of the ships from the same squadron seem to have joined their opponents! This... This is a slaughter. They have no chance."

traits.locale_text: “飞船探测到开拓者舰队的加密频率上出现了活跃的音阵信息交换……他们开火了！他们在互相射击！但其中一支队伍的绝大部分舰船似乎已经叛变到了对方的阵营！这……这简直是一场屠杀，那些人必死无疑。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « Nous captons un échange-vox sur les fréquences cryptées des vaisseaux des Explorators... Ils ouvrent le feu ! Ils se tirent dessus ! Mais une bonne partie des vaisseaux du même escadron semble avoir rejoint les rangs de l'adversaire ! C'est... C'est un véritable massacre. Ils n'ont aucune chance. »
languages.original_text: "We are picking up an active vox-exchange on encrypted frequencies between the Explorator ships... They are opening fire! They are shooting one another! But a good part of the ships from the same squadron seem to have joined their opponents! This... This is a slaughter. They have no chance."

traits.locale_text: « Nous captons un échange-vox sur les fréquences cryptées des vaisseaux des Explorators... Ils ouvrent le feu ! Ils se tirent dessus ! Mais une bonne partie des vaisseaux du même escadron semble avoir rejoint les rangs de l'adversaire ! C'est... C'est un véritable massacre. Ils n'ont aucune chance. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «Hemos detectado una conversación por voco en frecuencias encriptadas entre las naves de exploradores... Han comenzado a dispararse entre ellas, pero parece que una parte importante de las naves del mismo escuadrón se ha pasado al bando de sus oponentes. Es su fin... No sobrevivirán».
languages.original_text: "We are picking up an active vox-exchange on encrypted frequencies between the Explorator ships... They are opening fire! They are shooting one another! But a good part of the ships from the same squadron seem to have joined their opponents! This... This is a slaughter. They have no chance."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos detectado una conversación por voco en frecuencias encriptadas entre las naves de exploradores... Han comenzado a dispararse entre ellas, pero parece que una parte importante de las naves del mismo escuadrón se ha pasado al bando de sus oponentes. Es su fin... No sobrevivirán».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「暗号化された周波数で探索船とのヴォクス交信を確認…向こうが発砲しています！互いに撃ち合っているようです！しかし、同じ中隊のかなりの船は敵に寝返っているようです！これは…これは虐殺です。勝ち目はないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We are picking up an active vox-exchange on encrypted frequencies between the Explorator ships... They are opening fire! They are shooting one another! But a good part of the ships from the same squadron seem to have joined their opponents! This... This is a slaughter. They have no chance."

traits.locale_text: 「暗号化された周波数で探索船とのヴォクス交信を確認…向こうが発砲しています！互いに撃ち合っているようです！しかし、同じ中隊のかなりの船は敵に寝返っているようです！これは…これは虐殺です。勝ち目はないでしょう」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Wir empfangen auf verschlüsselten Frequenzen einen aktiven Voxaustausch zwischen den Exploratorschiffen ... Sie eröffnen das Feuer! Sie beschießen sich gegenseitig! Aber ein Großteil der Schiffe des Geschwaders scheint sich den Gegnern angeschlossen zu haben! Es ... Es ist ein Gemetzel. Sie haben keine Chance."
languages.original_text: "We are picking up an active vox-exchange on encrypted frequencies between the Explorator ships... They are opening fire! They are shooting one another! But a good part of the ships from the same squadron seem to have joined their opponents! This... This is a slaughter. They have no chance."

Aber ein Großteil der Schiffe des Geschwaders scheint sich den Gegnern angeschlossen zu haben! Es ... Es ist ein Gemetzel. Sie haben keine Chance."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Keşiftör gemilerinin şifreli frekanslardan kendi aralarında voks iletişimi kurduğunu saptadık... Ateş açıyorlar! Birbirlerini vuruyorlar! Aynı eskadradan gemilerin büyük kısmı düşman saflarına geçmiş! Bu... Bu bir katliam. En ufak şansları yok."
languages.original_text: "We are picking up an active vox-exchange on encrypted frequencies between the Explorator ships... They are opening fire! They are shooting one another! But a good part of the ships from the same squadron seem to have joined their opponents! This... This is a slaughter. They have no chance."
